Package com.github.yellowstonegames.freeze.world

package com.github.yellowstonegames.freeze.world
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BlendedBiomeMapperSerializer
    Serializer for BiomeMapper.BlendedBiomeMapper; doesn't need anything else registered.
    BlendedWorldMapViewSerializer
    Serializer for BlendedWorldMapView; needs the WorldMapGenerator implementation used by any given BlendedWorldMapView to also be registered.
    DetailedBiomeMapperSerializer
    Serializer for BiomeMapper.DetailedBiomeMapper; doesn't need anything else registered.
    DetailedWorldMapViewSerializer
    Serializer for DetailedWorldMapView; needs the WorldMapGenerator implementation used by any given DetailedWorldMapView to also be registered, as well as int[].
    DiagonalWorldMapSerializer
    Serializer for DiagonalWorldMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    EllipticalWorldMapSerializer
    Serializer for EllipticalWorldMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    FactionSerializer
    Serializer for PoliticalMapper.Faction; doesn't need anything else registered.
    GlobeMapSerializer
    Serializer for GlobeMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    HexagonalWorldMapSerializer
    Serializer for HexagonalWorldMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    HyperellipticalWorldMapSerializer
    Serializer for HyperellipticalWorldMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    LatLonWorldMapSerializer
    Serializer for LatLonWorldMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    LocalMapSerializer
    Serializer for LocalMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    MimicLocalMapSerializer
    Serializer for MimicLocalMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    MimicWorldMapSerializer
    Serializer for MimicWorldMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    PoliticalMapperSerializer
    Serializer for PoliticalMapper; needs the WorldMapGenerator implementation used by any given PoliticalMapper to also be registered, as well as the BiomeMapper implementation used.
    RotatingGlobeMapSerializer
    Serializer for RotatingGlobeMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    RoundSideWorldMapSerializer
    Serializer for RoundSideWorldMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    SimpleBiomeMapperSerializer
    Serializer for BiomeMapper.SimpleBiomeMapper; doesn't need anything else registered.
    SimpleWorldMapViewSerializer
    Serializer for SimpleWorldMapView; needs the WorldMapGenerator implementation used by any given SimpleWorldMapView to also be registered, as well as int[].
    StretchWorldMapSerializer
    Serializer for StretchWorldMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    TilingWorldMapSerializer
    Serializer for TilingWorldMap; doesn't need anything else registered.
    UnrealisticBiomeMapperSerializer
    Serializer for BiomeMapper.UnrealisticBiomeMapper; doesn't need anything else registered.
    UnrealisticWorldMapViewSerializer
    Serializer for UnrealisticWorldMapView; needs the WorldMapGenerator implementation used by any given UnrealisticWorldMapView to also be registered.
